Name: Puzzle Pieces
About the game: Puzzle Pieces is innovative take on puzzle games that brings something new. You might have heard about puzzle escape games or puzzle fighting games, but have you ever heard about puzzle matching game that isn't stereotypical match 3 game? What exactly is Puzzle Pieces? It's puzzle game about matching three pieces of jigsaw puzzles, testing your reflexes and getting the biggest score possible. How do you do that? By controlling the central puzzle piece. Are you waiting in Matchmaking in your favorite game or are you just bored? Well we got something for you! Puzzle Pieces is a easy to learn but hard to master game! It's quick and it can be started, paused and stoped any time! With Puzzle Pieces boredom is no longer an issue. Tired of always online games? No problem! Puzzle Pieces is designed to be played offline!
